mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.name AS category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
SELECT p.*, c.name AS category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.category_id = #{categoryId} AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
SELECT p.*, c.name AS category_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, category_id, price, stock, image, description, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{image}, #{description}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET stock = stock - #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id}
